name: Godotscop (Petscop Remake)
description:
A very early Godot engine version of the amazing ARG petscop. As of right now all there is to do is push a box around an empty newmaker plane, as time goes on I will likely update it with more content, or of course you can participate your self as the project is open source for anyone to edit and use for their own creations. All I ask is that you give credit to me and the artists that made some of the assets I used.

Controls:

Move: Up down Left Right
Fullscreen: f11

Credits:

Music: Fred Stoyva, Rj's Game Corner
PlayerSprite: RootLM/Liam
